review_text: We have had this maker a few years now and its reliable, fast and easy to use.Clean up is very easy and I just bought a second bowl to keep in the freezer if we need more than one batch at a time.I have also used it to make frozen lemonade concentrate from myers lemons and it turned out awesome.Then had my own home made lemonade concentrate to make fresh lemonade in the summer.This machine is not loud, and is easy to use and makes delicious ice cream.
summary: Reliable quick easy ice cream, easy clean up
product_name: Cuisinart ICE-20 Automatic 1-1/2-Quart Ice Cream Maker, White
